## finna-pk inspect

Inspect and view details of an finna-pk generated SSH key

```
finna-pk inspect <path> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  finna-pk inspect ~/.ssh/id_ecdsa_sk-cert.pub
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for inspect
```
